definition: to be called/to be known as
variant of 秤[cheng4]/steelyard
to weigh/to state/to name/name/appellation/to praise
to fit/balanced/suitable
worker/workshop/(slang) troublesome/high-maintenance (person)
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Neal Cassady Who do you think drove their bus?  Neal Cassady drove their bus.
Today this is known as a ★ steelyard scale 13 .
sentences.chinese: 如今这种天平被称作“杆秤”。

sentences.english: We can call it a visit.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以把这称作一次省亲。

sentences.english: It used to be called "The Land of Fire" because it is so hot in summer.
sentences.chinese: 它曾被人们称作“火洲”，因为在夏天这里十分炎热。

sentences.english: Then why not call Bearden a Black American artist?
sentences.chinese: 那么，为什么不把比尔敦称作一个美国黑人艺术家呢？

sentences.english: Because of this,they were known as'prizefighters.'
sentences.chinese: 因此，他们被称作“博奖拳击手”。

sentences.english: Tubes are generally mounted on truck-trailer chassis, referred to as tube trailers.
sentences.chinese: 管道一般是安装在拖车底座上，称作管道拖车。

sentences.english: A list of links to other related sites, sometimes called a "blogroll".
sentences.chinese: 其它网站的链接列表，有时称作“友情链接”。

sentences.english: Required services are sometimes called requisitions to help distinguish needs from capabilities.
sentences.chinese: 要求的服务有时被称作请求，以便同功能需要相区分。

sentences.english: The nasal vaccine, called FluMist, is made of an attenuated live virus.
sentences.chinese: 称作流感喷雾的鼻喷雾疫苗由经稀释的活病毒制成。

sentences.english: Mr. Johnson was known as a walking dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊先生被称作一本活字典。

sentences.english: Can you tell me what kind of sentence can be called imperative sentence?
sentences.chinese: 你能告诉我什么样的句子可以称作祈使句吗？

sentences.english: In sensory psychology this effect is called a "positive afterimage."
sentences.chinese: 感官心理学将这种现象称作“正后像”。

sentences.english: Radiant energy is also called light energy.
We can now be called Pleiadians Plus.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在被称作昴宿星人集合。

sentences.english: The western desert state of Nevada is called The Silver State.
sentences.chinese: 西部沙漠的内华达州被称作产银之州。
